name: 5D scene reconstruction from crowdsourcing cameras.
body:
### Project overview.
Project is developed in frame of master thesis project. The main focus of the project is detection of temporal changes in large-scale scenes reconstructed with use of Structure from Motion techniques.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Dependencies
The code is written solely in C++ however it leverages several external libraries and software. In order to run the code one has to make sure first to have installed following components:
-PCL libraries
-VCG libraries
-OpenCV
-boost 
-VisualSFM(command line functionality is required - only CUDA enabled hardware)

### Rather Drive Stick?
In order to get the code you can either use the links above or run in the terminal
```
git checkout https://github.com/bheliom/finalProject.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
Waldemar Franczak(@bheliom).

### Contact
For any questions please write to bhelioom@gmail.com
